string.name: wp_messages_component_title
string.context: Default title for the Messages activity

string.name: wp_messages_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient to the messages activity.

resources.string: 如果您想提问或与您的护理团队分享一些信息，请从这里向他们发送消息。对于任何紧急情况，请务必使用护士呼叫按钮！

string.name: wp_messages_tutorial_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient proxy to the messages activity. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: 如果您想提问或与%%PATNAME的护理团队分享一些信息，请从这里向他们发送消息。对于任何紧急情况，请务必使用护士呼叫按钮！

string.name: wp_messages_tutorial_overview_2
string.context: Tutorial text explaining further details about messages to the patient.

resources.string: 您的护理团队的任何一个人都可能回复您的消息。如果您的问题或评论是给某位特定人员，请在消息中指明。

string.name: wp_messages_tutorial_overview_2_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text explaining further details about messages to the patient proxy. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: %%PATNAME的护理团队的任何一个人都可能回复您的消息。如果您的问题或评论是给某位特定人员，请在消息中指明。
